def interpolate(curve: np.ndarray, samples=100, kind="cubic", inplace=True) -> np.ndarray:
        spline = interp1d(np.linspace(0, 1, curve.shape[0]), curve.T, kind=kind)
        t_fine = np.linspace(0, 1, samples)
        x_fine, y_fine = spline(t_fine)
        interpolated_curve = np.vstack((x_fine, y_fine)).T
